trans-unit.source: Provides data for the directory events: <xref href="System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Changed"></xref>, <xref href="System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Created"></xref>, <xref href="System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Deleted"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce dati per gli eventi di directory: <xref href="System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Changed"> </xref>, <xref href="System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Created"> </xref>, <xref href="System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Deleted"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The FileSystemEventArgs class is passed as a parameter to event handlers for these events: The <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Changed> event occurs when changes are made to the size, system attributes, last write time, last access time, or security permissions in a file or directory in the specified <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Path%2A> of a <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher>.
trans-unit.target: La classe FileSystemEventArgs viene passata come parametro ai gestori eventi per questi eventi: l' <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Changed>evento si verifica quando vengono apportate modifiche alle dimensioni, attributi di sistema, dell'ultima scrittura ora, l'ora dell'ultimo accesso o le autorizzazioni di sicurezza in un file o directory la specificata <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Path%2A>di un <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher>.</xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher> </xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Path%2A> </xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Changed>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Created> event occurs when a file or directory in the specified <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Path%2A> of a <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher> is created.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Created>evento si verifica quando un file o directory nella proprietà <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Path%2A>di un <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher>viene creato.</xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher> </xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Path%2A> </xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Created>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Deleted> event occurs when a file or directory in the specified <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Path%2A> of a <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher> is deleted.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Deleted>evento si verifica quando un file o directory nella proprietà <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Path%2A>di un <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher>viene eliminato.</xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher> </xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Path%2A> </xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Deleted>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IO.FileSystemEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.IO.FileSystemEventArgs"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.IO.WatcherChangeTypes"></xref> values, which represents the kind of change detected in the file system.
trans-unit.target: Uno del <xref href="System.IO.WatcherChangeTypes"> </xref> valori, che rappresenta il tipo di modifica rilevata nel file system.

trans-unit.source: The root directory of the affected file or directory.
trans-unit.target: La directory radice del file interessato o della directory.

trans-unit.source: The name of the affected file or directory.
trans-unit.target: Il nome del file interessato o della directory.

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of directory event that occurred.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il tipo di evento di directory che si è verificato.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.IO.WatcherChangeTypes"></xref> values that represents the kind of change detected in the file system.
trans-unit.target: Uno del <xref href="System.IO.WatcherChangeTypes"> </xref> valori che rappresenta il tipo di modifica rilevata nel file system.

trans-unit.source: Gets the fully qualifed path of the affected file or directory.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il percorso completo del file interessato o della directory.

trans-unit.source: The path of the affected file or directory.
trans-unit.target: Il percorso del file interessato o della directory.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the affected file or directory.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il nome del file interessato o della directory.

trans-unit.source: The name returned by the Name property is the relative path of the affected file or directory, with respect to the directory being watched.
trans-unit.target: Il nome restituito dalla proprietà Name è il percorso relativo del file interessato o della directory, in relazione alla directory controllata.

trans-unit.source: For example, if a <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher> object is watching the directory "C:\temp" and the file at "C:\temp\test\file.txt" changes, the Name property will return "test\file.txt".
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, se un <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher>oggetto controlla la directory "C:\temp" e il file "C:\temp\test\file.txt" cambia, la proprietà nome restituirà "test\file.txt".</xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher>

trans-unit.source: The name of the affected file or directory.
trans-unit.target: Il nome del file interessato o della directory.
